about_the_game:
"The First Peak is safe for hunting during the day. As for the other two... "

Help Wolf to get down the Mountain and let The Tribe know that her friend, Hunter cannot return. Fight the weather, the wilderness, the unexpected and the supernatural. Work together with the story's Narrator to uphold the Balance of the World!

  • Be the Wolf and beat Story Mode, save your family that exceeds blood, even species!
  • Collect all Kindred Souls and unlock Master Levels if you crave a challenge! Wait, you need more?
  • Replay the hardened Story Mode called Spirit Beast Run and show the Mountain who's boss! - Still not enough? Fine.
  • Fight through an even harder Story Mode with mutators and perma-death! Beat Feral Demigod Challenge and the Mountain will bend to your will!
  • Stay idle and watch as Wolf wags her tail! Wait. What.

... or just have fun.



Note: Currently, these game modes are not present in the free demo. There is a so called "Challenge" that should represent the difficulty curve of Master Levels.

- Bring Hunter's bag to the search party while listening to the voice-acted conversations between Wolf and Narrator
- Big explorable maps await you to solve puzzles and find a way to get around obstacles
- On the other hand - small, fast-paced maps will test your timing and precision
- Put down the bag and utilize Wolf's strong jaw or pick up shards and unleash spiritual abilities when you're out of options
- Immersion is guaranteed through gentle soundtracks and handcrafted pixel art

But be careful around Malevolence...
